item.title: Developing android app the fun way
item.description: Android is the buzz word right now. This is a great time for developers and users alike. But we still have the distinction of “developers” and “end users”. That difference is set to blur now. The pre-requisite for writing an android application was Knowledge of the Java programming language. With the introduction of Android Scripting Engine (ASE), Python developers too can join the fun. But still we have the user/developer distinction.
